analysis.description:
IcoCrowdsale.settleInvestment (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1275-1335) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(p.weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1319)

Reentrancy in IcoCrowdsale.settleInvestment (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1275-1335):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(p.beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1314)
	External calls sending eth:
	- p.investor.send(p.weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1306-1307)
	- wallet.transfer(p.weiAmount) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1319)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investments (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1320-1322)

Reentrancy in IcoCrowdsale.mintIcoEnablersTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1233-1242):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1240)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoEnablersTokensMinted (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1240-1241)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#602-615):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#604-605)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#605-609)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#619-630):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#624-626)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#626)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#627-628)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#409-425) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#421-422)

IcoCrowdsale.mintIcoEnablersTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1233-1242) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1240)

IcoCrowdsale.mintDevelopmentTeamTokens (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1249-1262) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(address(newVault),_tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1261-1262)

IcoCrowdsale.settleInvestment (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1275-1335) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(p.beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol#1314)

IcoCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(token).finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x1e025340d6f75a2a4ef81139049cfbf976782eeb.sol)
